name: 陳瑞鑫
objective: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction; Chapter 2 Vector Analysis
Week 2: Chapter 2 Vector Analysis
Week 3: Chapter 2 Vector Analysis
Week 4: Chapter 3 Static Electric Fields
Week 5: Chapter 3 Static Electric Fields
Week 6: Chapter 3 Static Electric Fields
Week 7: Chapter 3 Static Electric Fields
Week 8: Chapter 4 Solution of Electrostatic Problems
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Chapter 5 Steady Electric Currents
Week 11: Chapter 5 Steady Electric Currents
Week 12: Chapter 6 Static Magnetic Fields
Week 13: Chapter 6 Static Magnetic Fields
Week 14: Chapter 6 Static Magnetic Fields
Week 15: Chapter 7 Faraday's Law of Electromagnetic Induction; Maxwell's Equations; Wave Equations
Week 16: Chapter 8 Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines
Week 17: Chapter 8 Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy: 期中考30% + 期末考30% + 作業20% + 出席率20%
materials:
教科書:
D. K. Cheng, ” Field and Wave Electromagnetics,” 2nd Ed., 偉明圖書。
參考書目:
1. S. M. Wentworth, ”Fundamentals of Electromagnetics with Engineering Applications,” 滄海書局。
2. F. T. Ulaby, ”Fundamentals of Applied Electromagnetics,” 東華書局。
3. B. S. Guru and H. R. Hiziroglu, ”Electromagnetic Field Theory Fundamentals,” 高立圖書。
4. 李長綱, ”電磁學與電磁波的理論及應用(上)(下),” 鼎茂圖書。
